course_title: Seminar in Methods of Art Historical Research
class_notes: This class is designed as an orientation to the historiography, methods and profession of Art History. We will address primary texts, sample the approaches and contributions of various art historians to the field including an effort to understand the most current problems confronting the field.
course_description: This class is designed as an orientation to the historiography, methods and profession of Art History. We will address primary texts, sample the approaches and contributions of various art historians to the field, and make occasional trips to museums, symposia, and the Rare Book room in the Woodruff Library.
sections: Class Nbr: 3440, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 5:15-8p, Instructor: T. Cronan, Status: Open
